title: Deluge LXC
textContent:
Deluge LXC 
                Deluge is a
                    free,
                    open-source, lightweight BitTorrent client. It supports various platforms including Windows, Linux,
                    and
                    macOS, and offers features such as peer exchange, DHT, and magnet links.
                To create a new Proxmox VE Deluge LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/deluge.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                ⚙️ Initial Login
                password deluge
                Deluge Interface: IP:8112
outerHTML:
Deluge LXC

Deluge is a free, open-source, lightweight BitTorrent client. It supports various platforms including Windows, Linux, and macOS, and offers features such as peer exchange, DHT, and magnet links.

To create a new Proxmox VE Deluge LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/deluge.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

⚙️ Initial Login

password deluge

Deluge Interface: IP:8112
